title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
Immune Deficiency Foundation
Primary Immunodeficiency (PI)
You Might Be Eligible for Pemivibart (Pemgarda™)
People who are moderately or severely immunocompromised, are ages 12 and older, and who weigh at least 88 pounds may be eligible to get
Pemivibart (Pemgarda™)
